name: Heart Border Tote Bag Kit
description:
This tote bag with a cross stitch heart frame has been designed so you can add your own hand made creativity and make it unique.

The heart border in the shape of a frame has been inspired by vintage cross stitch samplers. It can be cross stitched using embroidery thread colours of your choice. There is a special area in the middle of the design where you can add your own message or personal initials. It would make an ideal gift for a craft lover or you could stitch it especially for someone. It could also make a good alternative to a gift bag.

Each bag comes with a mini kit which includes a postcard with cross stitch instructions, two different colours of embroidery thread and a needle. The bag looks good just with the screen print so you can add as many or as few cross stitches as you want. You have the option to choose both embroidery thread colours.

The bag is made from 100% eco cotton and hand screen printed in London using environmentally friendly printing inks.

The bag measures 38 x 43 cm with long handles, approx 100g in weight. The instruction postcard is A6 size and the length of each embroidery thread is 8 metres.

name: 'Stitch Invaders' Cross Stitch Kit
description:
Remember the 80's? When these little invaders from outer space were the height of entertainment! Now you can relive those memories with this cross stitch kit...

This kit includes a 'stitch me up' postcard with cross stitch instructions, a stitch invaders card, two different colours of embroidery thread, a 10.5 x 14 cm piece of fabric and a needle.

The card doubles up as a cross stitch pattern so you can have hours of fun creating something to keep forever. The card is available in different colours with a green or red and blue invaders on a black or white background. You have the option to choose your embroidery thread colours.

The card is blank on the inside so you can add your own personal message- it measures approx. 10.5 x 14.5 cm and comes with a white envelope, professionally printed on 340gsm card with a smooth finish on the outside.

The kit is packaged together in a re-sealable clear plastic bag.

name: Bunny Rabbit Mug
description:
A lovely ceramic mug made in Britain, printed with a colourful design of bunnies in a garden, inspired by embroideries and folk art.

This mug brings happy thoughts of spring time in to your home all year round - whenever you want to think of bunnies hopping about in the grass!

Designed in London with diverse inspiration from British nature and Mexican embroideries. The design goes around the mug, so both sides have a little rabbit looking back at you.

This ceramic mug is microwave and dishwasher safe, approximately 9cm high with a large handle.

name: Bunny Rabbit Pocket Mirror
description:
A lovely pocket mirror made in Britain, printed with a colourful design of a bunny in nature, inspired by embroideries and folk art.

Pop this mirror in your make up bag to remind you of happy thoughts of spring time all year round - including when the weather is gloomy and you want to think of bunnies hopping about in the grass! This would make a sweet little gift for someone special.

Designed in London with diverse inspiration from British nature and Mexican embroideries. One side has a mirror and the other has a little rabbit looking back at you.

Made from top quality metal components and mirror glass, approximately 6cm in diameter.

name: Bird Pocket Mirror
description:
A lovely pocket mirror made in Britain, printed with a colourful design of a bird, inspired by embroideries and folk art.

Pop this mirror in your make up bag to remind you of happy thoughts of birds in flight - including when the weather is gloomy and you want to think of birds flying freely! This would make a sweet little gift for someone special.

Designed in London with diverse inspiration from British nature and Mexican embroideries. One side has a mirror and the other has a little bird looking back at you.

Made from top quality metal components and mirror glass, approximately 6cm in diameter.

name: I heart ... card and cross stitch kit
description:
This kit includes a 'stitch me up' postcard with cross stitch instructions, 'I heart ...' card, two different colours of embroidery thread, a 10.5 x 14 cm piece of fabric and a needle.

The card doubles up as a cross stitch pattern so you can have hours of fun creating something to keep forever. You can draw your own design on the card before giving it to someone else or give them the kit and let their imagination kick in.

The card is blank on the inside so you can add your own personal message- it measures approx. 10.5 x 14.5 cm and comes with a white envelope, professionally printed on 340gsm card with a smooth finish on the outside.

The kit is packaged together in a re-sealable clear plastic bag.

name: 'Stitch Invaders' t shirt
description:
The 'stitch invaders' t shirt has been designed so the new owner can add to it themselves and make it truly unique.

Each t shirt comes with a mini kit which includes a postcard with cross stitch instructions, two different colours of embroidery thread and a needle. Remember the 80's? When these little invaders from outer space were the height of entertainment! Now you can relive those memories with this cross stitch kit...

This looks good just with the screen print so you can add as many or as few cross stitches as you want.

Printed on a white fairtrade t shirt made from 100% organic cotton. This listing is for a medium sized t shirt - the across chest measurement taken under the sleeve is 47cm and the length is 65cm. Please get in touch if you would like to order a different size (as listed in the size chart shown).

Every t shirt is individually hand screen printed, meaning each one is unique.

www.cerysturner.com

name: I heart...tote
description:
The 'I heart...' stitch bag has been designed so you can add your own hand made creativity and make it truly unique.

Each bag comes with a mini kit which includes a postcard with cross stitch instructions, two different colours of embroidery thread and a needle.

The bag looks good just with the screen print so you can add as many or as few cross stitches as you want.

Printed on an eco-friendly tote bag made from 100% cotton. The bag measures 38 x 40cm and has long handles.

Every bag is individually hand screen printed, this means the placement of the print may vary slightly from bag to bag and some stitches to a limited number of the bags to make each one special.

Would make an ideal Christmas present.
